page.title: 13CONVERSATIONS IN N.BRISTOL
page.content: "Hi Goodie,Hi Shar, shell we mog off school?" "No.I might get told off". "Or right then,you go a school but don't tell Wood'ouse or else yull get dun." ------------------------------------- "Or right Shar.?" "Or right Sash? " "Why ain't you lookin appy? " "Well, ar muh told I off for nuffin aa all." "Dint you do anyfin?" "Well ar Mand went off cryin to ar muh and she said I it er and I dint." "Dint you tell er that you dint it er." "Well I tried to but she dint listen. I ate er." "oo?" "Ar Mand. I just don't bodder with er." "You don't mean that dew?" "Not really,but sometimes she gets right on me nerves." -------------------------------------- {MOG}=TRUANT;{AR MUH }=OUR MUM;{AA}=AT {DINT} =DID NOT;{DEW }=DO YOU;
